message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product that could be a game-changer for your business. While I can't disclose the exact details yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000.  Consider this your chance to secure a potentially lucrative asset at a competitive price.  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.  Let me know your thoughts.
